text: When I woke up, I found myself in a place I didn't recognize.

name: Me
text: (Hmm... where am I...?)
I was in the middle of a forest. I seemed to have collapsed and been sleeping here.

name: Me
text: (Eh!? Wh-What's going on...?)
I had no idea what was happening. Why had I been sleeping in the middle of a forest like this?
If I remembered correctly, yesterday was New Year's Eve.
I remembered eating toshikoshi soba noodles that Tokiko had made, and afterwards having a gaming marathon with the freeloading Sakura,
and then falling asleep somewhere around that point.
And yet I was now in the middle of this forest that I didn't even know the location of.
What the hell was going on...?

name: Me
text: (A-Anyway, let me clear my head...)
Maybe it was because I had just woken up, but both my mind and body were just not cooperating. It felt as if wasn't my own body.
I basically dragged myself toward the sound of a small creek burbling close by.
And when I brought my face close to the water surface to wash itー

name: Me
text: Whoa!? A giant boar!?
I whipped my head around in panic. On the water surface, there was a reflection of a massive boar bearing down right on top of me.
However...

name: Me
text: Huh? Where did it go...?
When I turned around, there was no sign of the boar that had been reflected in the water.
What was going on...?
While I pondered that, I took another peek into the creek, and sure enough, the giant boar was there.
I turned around, and it wasn't there. But it was there when I looked into the water.
When I raised my right hand, the boar in the water also raised its right hoof.
And for starters, the only thing being reflected in the water was the giant boar. My own reflection was nowhere to be seen.
Did that mean...?

name: Me
text: WHAT THE HELL IS GOING OOOOOOOOOOOOON!!!??

name: Me
text: (This is me!? This giant boar is me!?)
My arms and legs were the limbs of a beast, densely covered in thick fur. I didn't have any clothes on and was walking on all fours.
I had woken up to find I had somehow turned into a giant boar.

name: Me
text: What's going on!? Why is something like this happening just as the new year started!?
I couldn't make heads or tails of my predicament.
But everything was about to become even more nonsensicalー

name: Genin A
text: There he is! The New Year's lucky boar, Kiyomaro!

name: Genin B
text: Don't let him escape! Surround and kill him!

name: Me
text: Huh!? Taimanin!?
Several Taimanin had appeared.
They seemed to be low-ranking ninja, and I didn't recognize any of them.
The Taimanin slowly surrounded me (the boar), blocking my escape path.

name: Me
text: W-Wait!! What the hell...

name: Genin A
text: I have nothing to say to an animal! Give up, Auspicious Beast!

name: Me
text: By beast, you mean me!? Whaaa!? Wait a secooooond!!!
The Taimanin attacked me all at once as I screamed.
I (the boar) escaped the Taimanin by the skin of my tusks.

name: Me
text: Phew. I was nearly hunted down as a wild boar...
My new boar body seemed to be pretty powerful, and I was able to break through the Taimanin blocking my path by charging at them.
And I had fled deeper into the forest without stopping.

name: Me
text: Why are they hunting boar, anyway...? Are they planning to put me into the New Year's ozoni?  I'm not a soup ingredient, you vile bastards.
I was mulling it over when something hit me.

name: Me
text: (Come to think of it, they called me a "lucky boar," didn't they...?)
"Lucky boar" and "auspicious beast"ー

name: Me
text: That's it! I came across those words in an old document I read...
It had been an old document I had found in the archives of Gosha Academy regarding a certain ceremony.
And if I remembered correctly, according to itー
The best time of the year to perform the ceremony was on New Year's Day, when the air was full of fresh and pure Ki.
In the past, a heretical ritual called the "Rite of the Auspicious Beast" was held on this day.
It was said to have been a ritual that would summon a divine beast, a harbinger of good luck from the Otherworld, and slaying it would bring immense fortune.
However, if the beast got away unscathed, the ceremony would have the opposite effect, giving rise to terrible misfortune.
It seemed like it had been a dangerous ritual, and it was forbidden nowadays.

name: Me
text: (So those guys are after me because of that ceremony...?)
But even if that were the case, why the hell had I turned into a boar...?
*Rustle*...

name: Me
text: !? Who's there!?
I heard the sound of footsteps from behind me. And when I turned around, thereー

name: Igawa Asagi
text: No need to be alarmed. I'm not your enemy. ...But my, you look a lot worse than I heard you would.

name: Me
text: Asagi-sensei...!?
A beautiful girl in a long-sleeved kimono was looking at me (the boar) and spoke in astonishment.

It was the headmistress of Gosha Academyー
Igawa Asagi-sensei.

name: Me
text: (N-No, wait, something's not right...!! Asagi-sensei is so... young!?)

name: Asagi
text: I don't know why you're calling me "sensei," but judging by your reaction, you do appear to be the "scapegoat."

name: Me
text: The scapegoat!? So you're after me too, Asagi-sensei...!?
Asagi-sensei was the person who led all Taimanin.
Did that mean she was commanding those Taimanin chasing me earlier as wellー!?

name: Asagi
text: I told you that you don't need to be alarmed, didn't I? I'm not your enemy.

name: Asagi
text: ...But it looks like I have no time to explain.

name: Me
text: Eh?

name: Genin A
text: There's the lucky boar!! Take him down this time!!
Following a rustling sound, the Taimanin from earlier jumped out of the bushes.

name: Me
text: These guys!? They're still after me!?

name: Asagi
text: I'll explain everything after we stave them off. Here they comeー!!
